channel.title: Divine Syndicate - The Everlasting Pk'ing | Economy | PvP Armor | Nex | Join tod
channel.description:
Welcome to the official Divine Syndicate advertisement page.
About Divine Syndicate:
Welcome to Divine Syndicate! Divine Syndicate is a Free2Play RuneScape Economy Private Server. So yes, you are reading it good. Its Economy so you will not be able to spawn items, you will make your own money by doing skills, vote4reward, selling items & killing monsters or players. Of course we made it really easy to get money in Divine Syndicate, we have all working skills in the RuneScape of today. We are very proud that we are one of the first servers that has that done, that makes Divine Syndicate unique. Keep in mind that we are updating our server day & night and trying to fix all the bugs known, so if you see any bugs or anything weird u can contact any In-Game staff and he will report it to me and i will fix it as soon as possible! Further we have a new page called: New Updates, you can check that out for every single update we have added to the game. Please vote every 12 hours for Divine Syndicate by clicking on the page: Vote4Rewards, you will vote on 3 different vote sites and you will get your own selected reward + 1 vote point. What are you waiting for, go and check out Divine Syndicate! See you in the game, Divine Staff.
Divine Syndicate on YouTube [CENTER][url=http://www.youtube.com/user/DivineSyndicateRSPS]DivineSyndicateRSPS - YouTube[/url][B] <-- Click here for some server video's.[/B][/CENTER]
[SPOILER=Media][COLOR="#FF0000"][B][CENTER]Media[/CENTER][/B][/COLOR] [B]Our webpage:[/B] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/3259118/WebsiteHomePage.png[/img]
Forum(Currently working on): [img]http://www.upload.ee/thumb/3259124/ForumWerkende.png[/img]

City Lodestone: [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/3259129/Lodestone.png[/img]
Custom player panel: [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/3259130/PlayerPanel.png[/img]
Loyalty shop(Gain loyalty points every hour of playing): [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/3259132/Loyalty.png[/img]
Client look for Non-Donor's: [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/3259133/NonDonorClient.png[/img]
Client for Donor's: [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/3259135/DonatorClient.png[/img]
Boss teleport: [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/3259136/BossTeleport.png[/img]
Fullscreen: [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/3259138/FullScreen.png[/img]
Hunter skill: [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/3259140/Hunter.png[/img]

Skill overlook: [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/3259143/SkillOverlook.png[/img]
Vote4Reward gets u 1 vote point+ an item to choose: [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/3259147/Vote4Reward.png[/img]
Vote4Reward gets u 1 vote point+ an item to choose on website, VotePoint shop: [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/3259146/VoteShop.png[/img][/SPOILER] [SPOILER=Divine Syndicate on Toplist:]
Divine Syndicate on TopList [url=http://www.rune-server.org/toplist/detail/7612/Divine_Syndicate/]Rune-Server - TopList - Divine Syndicate[/url][/SPOILER]

[SIZE=4][COLOR="#FF0000"][B]Thanks for reading this and please leave some comment about your thoughts.
